text: Unless the method of offer or disposition is adopted for the purpose of evasion of this chapter, the provisions of §§ 42-1904.02, 42-1904.03, 42- 1904.04, 42-1904.05, 42-1904.06, 42-1904.07, 42-1904.08, 42- 1904.09, and 42-1904.12 do not apply to:
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 45-1861.

1973 Ed., § 5-1261.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-89, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-1901.01.

For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-233, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-1901.07.

DC CODE § 42-1904.01

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Dispositions in a condominium in which all units are restricted to commercial, industrial, or other nonresidential use;
Dispositions by any government or government agency;
Solicitation and acquisition by the declarant of nonbinding reservation agreements;
Dispositions by foreclosure or deed in lieu of foreclosure.
